item.title: Integrating Microsoft Defender for Endpoint with Microsoft Intune for Enhanced Device Security
item.description: Securing your organization’s devices against cyber threats is a critical priority in today’s digital landscape. Microsoft Intune, combined with Microsoft Defender for Endpoint, provides a powerful solution to enhance your device security posture. In this comprehensive guide, we’ll explore the steps to configure the integration between these two Microsoft services, allowing you to effectively onboard devices, set compliance policies based on risk levels, and leverage conditional access to protect your corporate resources.
